findings.title: Contract Owner is able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions and may take advantage of it by calling the `setBlacklisted` function or setting the `_maxTxAmount` to zero.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to transfer tokens from a specific address.

findings.title: Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner and set `_maxTxAmount` to zero, allowing them to transfer user's tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%)
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to set fees, but there is no check to prevent setting the fee percentage more than a reasonable amount (25%).

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to increase the amount of liquidity taken by dev wallet more than a reasonable percent
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to set `_maxTxAmount` but lacks a check to prevent setting it less than a reasonable amount, allowing them to take advantage.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to mint new tokens
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the ability to mint new tokens.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to burn tokens from specific wallet
findings.description: The contract owner lacks the capability to burn tokens from a specific wallet.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to blacklist wallets from selling
findings.description: The contract owner does not have the authority to stop wallets from selling.

findings.title: Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: Unnecessary Boolean equality
findings.description: The comparison to boolean constants is redundant. Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false.

findings.title: Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters. There are functions that have no event emitted, so it is difficult to track off-chain changes.
